Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Olden \Old"en\, a. Old; ancient; as, the olden time. ``A minstrel of the olden stamp.'' --J. C. Shairp. [1913 Webster]

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Olden \Old"en\, v. i. To grow old; to age. [R.] [1913 Webster]
She had oldened in that time. --Thackeray. [1913 Webster]
olden adj : of time long past; "olden days"
